mapper.select: SELECT mg.goods_id AS goodsId, mg.goods_name AS goodsName, mg.goods_unit_id AS goodsUnitId, mg.goods_catagory_id AS goodsCatagoryId, mg.price AS price, mg.description AS description, mg.remark AS remark, mg.create_user_id AS createUserId, mg.create_time AS createTime, mg.is_enable_id AS isEnableId FROM mall_goods mg WHERE mg.is_enable_id = 1 AND mg.goods_id = #{goodsId} AND mg.goods_name LIKE '%${goodsName}%'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mall_goods( goods_id, goods_name, goods_unit_id, goods_catagory_id, price, description, remark, create_user_id, create_time, is_enable_id ) VALUES
( #{item.goodsId}, #{item.goodsName}, #{item.goodsUnitId}, #{item.goodsCatagoryId}, #{item.price}, #{item.description}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.isEnableId})

update.foreach: UPDATE mall_goods SET goods_name = #{item.goodsName}, goods_unit_id = #{item.goodsUnitId}, goods_catagory_id = #{item.goodsCatagoryId}, price = #{item.price}, description = #{item.description}, remark = #{item.remark}, create_user_id = #{item.createUserId}, create_time = #{item.createTime}, is_enable_id = #{item.isEnableId} WHERE goods_id = #{item.goodsId}
